title: 我的服务端无法启动求助{急！！！！！}
txt_content:
我的1.10.2MOD服无法启动了我怀疑是末影接口的问题
运行日志
链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1EiH817A4W1j-2Zu6J5qNZw 提取码: p4fk 
服务器核心sponge
版本1.10.2
因为有大量插件所以我不方便换核心

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
反编译EnderIO后发现错误原因会被写到crash-report之外，然后就往前翻log，看到：
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: =======================================================================
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: == ENDER IO FATAL ERROR ==
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: =======================================================================
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: Cannot register recipes as configured. This means that either
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: your custom config file has an error or another mod does bad
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: things to vanilla items or the Ore Dictionary.
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: =======================================================================
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: == Bad file ==
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: recipe_items_core.xml or recipe_items_user.xml
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: =======================================================================
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: == Error Message ==
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: Could not find a crafting ingredient for 'crystalFluix' (stack=null, object=null) in recipe 'Conduit, ME'
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: =======================================================================
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: 
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: =======================================================================
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: Note: To start the game anyway, you can disable recipe loading in the
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: Ender IO config file. However, then all of Ender IO's crafting recipes
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: will be missing.
[03:31:37] [Server thread/ERROR] [EnderIO/EnderIO]: =======================================================================
根据这个配方错误，我去找这个物品，看到是应用能源2的锅。鉴于1.10.2的AE2稳定性低下，可以考虑删除，或者关闭EIO这个功能：
在\config\enderio\enderio.cfg中找到字段
"item enabling" {
    # Allows ME conduits. Only has an effect with AE2 installed. [default: true]
    B:enableMEConduits=true
true改称false。
该方法治标不治本，况且我这里单独安装相同版本的EIO和AE2完全没遇到这个问题，也就是说这个功能原本正常，但被不知道哪个杂牌Mod给搞成这个鬼样了。

replies.author: Sweet-Potato
replies.txt_content: FoamFixAPI 出错了，把他删了把

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
UCHE        EnderIO{1.10.2-3.1.193} [Ender IO] ([末影接口]EnderIO-1.10.2-3.1.193.jar) 


末影接口加载错误。建议删除或者更新其他版本

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
https://github.com/AppliedEnergi ... stics-2/issues/2708
看样子这个是加载顺序的问题
你在EnderIO这个mod的文件名前加个aa应该就好了
